package.name: adaptive_component
package.description:
A ROS 2 Node subclass programmed as a "Component" to build adaptive computations. Adaptive ROS 2 Nodes are able to perform computations in the CPU, the FPGA or the GPU, adaptively. Adaptive behavior is controlled through the "adaptive" ROS 2 parameter.
Adaptive ROS 2 Nodes give roboticists a finer-grained control over the resources their computional graphs use in the underlying hardware.
package.author: Víctor Mayoral Vilches
